name: A Breath of Spring Air
description:
A Breath of Spring Air is  short puzzle platformer about clearing snow and watering plants to help them grow.

Progress through each level by removing as much snow as you can with your snow blower and watering all of the plants you uncover with your watering can. Some plants, like vines and forget-me-nots uncover more parts of the level for you to explore.  Can you get 100% completion in every level?

This game is an entry for the     #GreatSpringGameJam2021. Originally, I was going to spend more time on this game, which would've allowed me to add more levels and special flowers, however my exams got in the way and I ended up being a lot busier than I anticipated. I still think this game turned out fairly nicely, though.

If you're interested, you can check out the game's source code as well.
